name: Jumper (Dzhon)
description:
Hi! I am beginner in Unity and this is my very first game. I was learning and creating this clicker simultaneously. All assets exept sounds created by myself. Hope you'll enjoy it :)

KNOWN BUGS: Sometime when you click on the slime while autojump is bought it jump higher. If you click on the slime right before landing it stuck in jumping animation.
